body:
Facebook style guide says ""

But then, they also say to use relative paths if its in the same directory.
Why do we want to do that differently again? I'd rather stick with the established pattern (i.e. "" and absolute paths if out-of-directory but relative paths if same directory). But I don't have a strong opinion on this point.
